Literature Collection in Quantitative Genetics

Sep 8, 2017

Charles Darwin (1809-1882)

  • Darwin, C. (1861). On the origin of species. [pdf]

Gregor Mendel (1822-1884)

  • Mendel, G. (1865). Experiments in plant hybridization. [pdf]

Francis Galton (1822-1911)

  • Galton, F. (1877). Typical laws of heredity. Nature. [pdf]
  • Galton, F. (1886). Regression towards mediocrity in hereditary stature. Journal of the Anthropological Institute. [pdf]
  • Galton, F. (1889). Natural Inheritance. Macmillan, London [pdf]

Karl Pearson(1857-1936)

  • Pearson, K, Alice Lee. (1903). On the Laws of Inheritance in Man: I. Inheritance of Physical Characters. Biometrika. [pdf]
  • Pearson, K. (1920). Notes on the History of Correlation. Biometrika. [pdf]

Ronald Fisher (1890-1962)

  • Fisher, RA. (1918). The Correlation between Relatives on the Supposition of Mendelian Inheritance. Proc. Roy. Soc. Edinburgh. [pdf] [pdf2]
  • Fisher, RA. (1919). The Causes of Human Variability. Eugen Rev. [pdf]
  • Fisher, RA. (1941). Average Excess and Average Effect of a Gene Substitution. [pdf]

Sewall Green Wright (1889-1988)

  • Wright, S. (1921) Systems of Mating I. The Biometric Relations betweens Parent and Offspring. Genetics. [pdf]
  • Wright, S. (1921) Systems of Mating II. The Effects of Inbreeding on the Genetic Composition of a Population. Genetics. [pdf]

Charles Roy Henderson (1911-1989)

  • Henderson CR. (1949). Estimation of changes in herd environment. J Dairy Sci. [pdf]
  • Henderson CR. (1950). Estimation of genetic parameters. Ann Math Stat. [pdf]

Jay Laurence Lush (1896-1982)

Alan Robertson
